import React from 'react'; import { Redirect } from 'react-router'; import doordelivery from '../images/doordelivery.png' class Service extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state={ from:"", to:"", weight:"", length:"", breadth:"", height:"" }; } handleChange = (e)=>{ this.setState({[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } render(){ if (this.props.service){ return(

{this.props.service.name}

{this.props.service.slogan}

Parcel Size
Package can size up to {this.props.service.psize} (total dimensions of 3 sides) and {this.props.service.pweight}.
Package Charges
Packages are charged on the basis on their weightand travel distance.
FAQ

When will InfyExpress deliver my parcel

What happen if something goes wrong?

Can I send envelopes?

What should I do if my parcel is delayed or lost?

When will my parcel be delivered
Get a Quote..
); } return null; } } export default Service;
